text: The setup you're working on during your PhD is centered around a dilution refrigerator. This is a quite complex system that is around in QPIT since 7+ years ago. Your goal for the next months is to use this setup to characterize and manipulate the otomechanical respose of a quartz crystal. However, two weeks before the start of your PhD, the fridge stopped working.
